Text:
Full Credits to: Souless 

Original author of cracked Halo Portable Edition (HDE).

Link of original version:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4042785/Halo__Portable_Edition_for_Halo_Custom_Edition

all i did was make it 100% Portable, Stealth, and work from any directory/location/folder.

This already comes with 25 Maps...
==================================
01. beavercreek.map
02. bitmaps.map
03. bloodgulch.map
04. boardingaction.map
05. carousel.map
06. chillout.map
07. damnation.map
08. dangercanyon.map
09. deathisland.map
10. deltaruins.map
11. gephyrophobia.map
12. hangemhigh.map
13. icefields.map
14. immure.map
15. infinity.map
16. loc.map
17. longest.map
18. prisoner.map
19. putput.map
20. ratrace.map
21. sidewinder.map
22. sounds.map
23. timberland.map
24. ui.map
25. wizard.map

BUT YOU CAN ADD MORE MAPS ... HERE'S HOW:

1. Start Halo

2. Play Online

3. Shut down

4. Navigate to:
"Halo Custom Edition\MODIFIED\@SYSDRIVE@\Halo Custom Edition"

5. Create new folder "Maps", so the directory should look like this:
"Halo Custom Edition\MODIFIED\@SYSDRIVE@\Halo Custom Edition\Maps"

6. Download more maps from:
http://hce.halomaps.org/

7. Put new maps in "Maps" folder. (.map file only)

8. Start Halo and it will automatically detect new maps

Tip: when you're at the online lounge, go into options, and select to "SHOW":
user created maps. Otherwise, Halo will not list games with custom maps.
